nodes.text: Lahiroo were a species of feathered reptiles native to the planet Batuu. Their calls could be heard from within Black Spire Outpost. Some residents of Batuu raised lahiroo to become pets or for other reasons.

Lahiroo were created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. While not physically present in the park, sound clips of the their calls can be heard in certain areas.
